pages.text: Building a beacon or conduit is a lot of work. You have to remember the number of levels or shape of the structure, etc. No more! In this pack, we have two mods which make the process of beacon/conduit building a breeze.

pages.title: Better Beacon Placement
pages.text: This mod, as the name suggests, makes beacon building super easy. Simply right click on a beacon while holding a valid base block, and it will add that block to the beacon structure. Any blocks which get replaced will drop on top of the beacon for you to pick up.

pages.title: Better Conduit Placement
pages.text: This mod, as the name suggests, makes conduit building super easy. Simply right click on a conduit while holding a valid block, and it will add that block to the conduit structure.
